sizes.name: Responsive
sizes.description:
These size variables can be applied to any css property that needs to resize when the component is viewed on a mobile screen.
These variables are defined based on the var(--theme-responsive-factor), which serves as a multiplier when the screen drops below the mobile breakpoint.
This interaction has been introduced to enable bigger touch areas on mobile devices.
sizes.markup: Responsive padding

sizes.name: Rounded
sizes.description:
These sizes are specific for rounded corners or border-radius.
There are 7 rounded sizes available, defined based on the var(--theme-border-radius) value provided.
Please note the rounded size variables also respond to the var(--theme-responsive-factor) on mobile screens.
sizes.markup: Rounded corners

sizes.name: Scalable
sizes.description:
These size variables can be applied to any spacing-related css property like padding or margin.
The scalable sizes are intended to allow increased/decreased whitespace across components.
Please note the scalable size variables are also multiplied by the var(--theme-responsive-factor) when the screen drops below the mobile breakpoint.
sizes.markup: Scalable padding

pagination.description: Use 3 digits sparingly. Avoid page number sets that go above 100.

pagination.description: Utilize the Slim version for compact pagination with focus on effective search results on the first few pages. Unit count displays the amount of items on the current page. The number of pages listed may not display total amount of pages that contain the total results.

toggle.name: Disabled and active toggles
toggle.description: Toggle button using a input of type radio to enable single selection with disabled and active state.
toggle.markup:
<fieldset class="v-toggle-container">
  <label class="v-toggle v-gap-6" for="toggle-5a">
    <input checked="" id="toggle-5a" name="toggle-4" type="radio"/>
    <svg aria-hidden="true" class="v-icon v-icon-tiny" focusable="false" height="16" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16">
      <use href="#visa-map-location-tiny">
      </use>
    </svg>
    Label 1
  </label>
  <label class="v-toggle v-gap-6" for="toggle-5b">
    <input id="toggle-5b" name="toggle-4" type="radio"/>
    <svg aria-hidden="true" class="v-icon v-icon-tiny" focusable="false" height="16" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16">
      <use href="#visa-view-list-tiny">
      </use>
    </svg>
    Label 2
  </label>
  <label class="v-toggle v-gap-6" for="toggle-5c">
    <input disabled="" id="toggle-5c" name="toggle-4" type="radio"/>
    <svg aria-hidden="true" class="v-icon v-icon-tiny" focusable="false" height="16" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16">
      <use href="#visa-view-grid-tiny">
      </use>
    </svg>
    Label 3
  </label>
</fieldset>
